chinese: 一个现场的演出就像在乐队里或怎样.
english: A live performance as in a band or something,

chinese: 真是要好上百倍.
english: so that's like a hundred times better.

chinese: 我意思是说,你可以感受到, 你可以感受到音乐,成为音乐的一部分.
english: I mean, you just get, you get to feel the music and be part of it.

chinese: 有时候能有超过两三个人也挺不错的.
english: Sometimes it's nice to have more than two or three people.

chinese: 有时有一大群人也很好
english: Sometimes it's nice when you get a big group of people

chinese: 可以激发你, 让你感觉你知道自己为什么在那儿.
english: it can charge you and make you feel like you know why you're there.

chinese: 我想人们喜欢去剧院是因为, 那种外出的感觉,
english: I think people like the theater just 'cause the feeling of going out and,

chinese: you know,为出门做准备, sort of, 放松一下,出去买点东西吃.
english: you know, preparing for it, sort of, and relax and you go and get something to eat.

chinese: 电影是最常见的,因为到处都是, 但我喜欢看戏.
english: Movies are the most common 'cause they're the most around, but I like going to plays.

chinese: 是的, 我去过喜剧俱乐部.
english: Yeah, I've been to comedy clubs.

chinese: 如会很开心, 如果我喜欢那场表演的话.
english: I enjoy them, if I like the show.

chinese: 我喜欢接受不同的文化, 去看不同的戏.
english: And I enjoy taking in different cultures, going to different plays

chinese: 我也看许多电影, 看单人喜剧表演, ah,类似那种的, 那就是我常常会去的地方.
english: I also watch a lot of movies and stand-up comedy and, ah, stuff like that, that's pretty much where I go.

chinese: 你看到的是真实的东西,
english: You're seeing something that's for real,

chinese: 而不是经过加工的东西,
english: versus something that's processed that,

chinese: you know, 仍然是同样的东西, 如果你一遍一遍去看的话,
english: you know, would be the same if you saw it again and again and again;

chinese: 如果你看同一部电影,
english: if you saw the same movie,

chinese: 下次再看时, 它还是一样.
english: it's going to be the same next time I see it.

chinese: 我去过几个专业剧院, er,我确实喜欢戏剧,真的很好.
english: I've been to a couple professional theaters and er, I do like the theater, it's very good.

chinese: 我表演魔术节目, 和一个大约15分钟一场的表演, 愉快地去做.
english: I do a magic act, and about a 15-minute show and just have fun doing that.

chinese: 我尽量每天都出来,当然也要取决于天气.
english: I try to come out every day, depending on the weather.

chinese: 我一般会换节目, 我会说, 每年.
english: I usually change my act, I'd say, each year.

chinese: You know, 我常常,er,在冬天设计我的节目,
english: You know, I pretty much, er, spend the winter designing it,

chinese: 排练好, 学习我要表演的东西,
english: putting it together and studying what I want to do

chinese: and, you know, 我要花大约一年时间来考虑我想做什么, 如何换花样.
english: and, you know, some, it takes me, er,about a year to think about what I want to do and how to change it.

chinese: 于是我拿起了他的吉他, 弹奏了我知道的三个和弦：D、A、G,
english: So I picked up his guitar and I played the three chords that I knew, D, A, G,

chinese: 当我漫不经心地弹时  有人从旁边经过,
english: and while I was strumming someone came along

chinese: 把一个1英镑的硬币扔在盒子里,
english: and threw a pound coin in the case

chinese: 于是我灵机一动, 我想,you know,
english: and this light bulb went off in my head and I said, you konw,

chinese: 为什么我要读工程和生产专业呢 当我也许可以自己做这个事情?
english: why am I studying engineering and production when I can maybe do this myself.
